thread.section_title: Absolute Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Ok place close to good food
thread.title_full: Ok place close to good food - Review of Absolute Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Gaby Z
title: Ok place close to good food
text:
Our room was a bit dark, but the radiator (once we figured out how to make it work) was much appreciated. The bathroom was very small (especially the shower) but it worked.
Bed was comfortable and the staff very nice and welcoming.
Would recommend the patisserie towards République station, and Pizza Pino in République has amazing creme brûlée.
